name: Pizza Project
description:
CLICK ON THE WHITE SPACE NEAR THE LEFT EDGE OF THE GAME A FEW TIMES IF INPUT ISN'T WORKING

^ This is a weird bug, it probably has something to do with Unity's WebGL export

This is my really short platformer / adventure game that i made for Ludum Dare 32 in just 48 hours.

The pizza project is a really powerfull pizza that kills everyone whom tries to eat (or touches) it

I wanted to make it a lot longer, but i unfortunately didn't have the time, that's why the end is just a small "sandbox" where you can shoot enemies.

Controls

----------

Left arrow : walk left

Right arrow : walk right

up arrow : jump

C : Shoot Pizza ( you can only do this if you have the pizza project )

BONUS: You can press and hold T to enable a "Pizza-Jetpack", this is a small easter egg ^^
